docs.snippet: Donald Trump Jr. has taken the reins of the Trump International Hotel near the White House after critics charged it was a conflict of interest for U.S. President Donald Trump to run the hotel while also running the federal government that is leasi...
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump Jr. has taken the reins of the Trump International Hotel near the White House after critics charged it was a conflict of interest for U.S. President Donald Trump to run the hotel while also running the federal government that is leasing the building to his company.

headline.main: Donald Trump Jr. Takes Over Washington Hotel Near White House
headline.print_headline: Donald Trump Jr. Takes Over Washington Hotel Near White House

docs.snippet: At a White House meeting with county sheriffs on Tuesday, President Trump joked about destroying the career of a Texas state senator, said he would take the fight on his immigration order “through the system” and slammed the news media, callin...
docs.lead_paragraph: At a White House meeting with county sheriffs on Tuesday, President Trump joked about destroying the career of a Texas state senator, said he would take the fight on his immigration order “through the system” and slammed the news media, calling it a “very, very dishonest arm.”

docs.snippet: The Texas Senate on Tuesday night preliminarily approved an anti-"sanctuary cities" bill punishing local governments that don't cooperate with federal immigration authorities, as state Republicans look to further crack down on an issue already cha...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Texas Senate on Tuesday night preliminarily approved an anti-"sanctuary cities" bill punishing local governments that don't cooperate with federal immigration authorities, as state Republicans look to further crack down on an issue already championed by President Donald Trump.

docs.snippet: A House committee voted on Tuesday to eliminate an independent election commission charged with helping states improve their voting systems as President Donald Trump erroneously claims widespread voter fraud cost him the popular vote....
docs.lead_paragraph: A House committee voted on Tuesday to eliminate an independent election commission charged with helping states improve their voting systems as President Donald Trump erroneously claims widespread voter fraud cost him the popular vote.
